pressRelease.title: EQ Inc. to Present at the Planet MicroCap

content.value: ”), a leader in geospatial data and artificial intelligence driven software, will present at the Planet MicroCap Showcase: VIRTUAL on Thursday, April 22nd at 12:30 PM EST. Geoffrey Rotstein, President and CEO of EQ Works, will host the presentation and answer questions from investors. The presentation will provide an overview of the Company’s proprietary LOCUS platform. This privacy first, behavioral data and intelligence platform combines data and AI to deliver unique and first-of-its-kind analytics and marketing solution in an evolving technological landscape.
To access the live presentation, please use the following details:
To book a one-on-one investor meeting with EQ Works or to watch the Company’s presentation, please register for the virtual event here:
One-on-one meetings will be scheduled and conducted via private, secure video conference through the conference event platform.
The Planet MicroCap Showcase: VIRTUAL website is available here:
For those unable to attend the live presentation, all company presentation webcasts will be available directly on the conference event platform on this link under the tab “Agenda”:

enables businesses to understand, predict and influence customer behaviour. Using unique data sets, advanced analytics, machine learning and artificial intelligence, EQ Works creates actionable intelligence for businesses to attract, retain, and grow the customers that matter most. The Company’s proprietary SaaS platform mines insights from movement and geospatial data, enabling businesses to close the loop between digital and real-world consumer actions.
